name: RenderCV
description: RenderCV is a Typst-based CV/resume generator designed for academics and engineers. It allows you to version-control your CV as YAML with Markdown syntax, then generates professional PDFs with perfect typography. Features multiple built-in themes (Classic, Engineeringresumes, Sb2nov, Moderncv), extensive design customization, strict validation, and multi-language support including Chinese, Japanese, and Korean characters.
author: rendercv
